metadata.title: CVE-2012-1262 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in cgi-bin/mt/mt-wizard.cgi inMovable Type before 4.38, 5.0x before 5.07, and 5.1x before 5.13, when theproduct is incompletely installed, allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via the dbuser parameter, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2012-0318.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-1262` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-zemanta - 5.1.4+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.1.4+dfsg-1').
